ygData.subject: Re: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: Remember though this effect the entire party, not just one person. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
Remember though this effect the entire party, not just one person.

Rokenn


>From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
>Date: Wed, 8 Dec 1999 11:06:52 -0500 (EST)
>
>I would assume it would reduce any attack by 10 damage also? Still
>sounds questionable as one more pulse of mana song would give the cleric
>more than enough mana to heal 10 damage?
>
>I don't know, I'm just a lowly level 27 bard.
>
>Ludvaraman
> >
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> >
> > I'd agree if a level 47 person would gain any benefit from a 10 point
>damage
> > shield. That was my question, how often does a level 47+ person ever
>get
> > hit for 10 points or less? Anyone out there who can answer that? As it
>is
> > a 10 pt damage shield would stop pretty much only the 1 pt hits I get.
>I
> > seldom get hit for more than 1 and less than 10. Do hit point shields
> > prevent damage from fire shields and the like?
> >
> > Kit
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Wayne Sheppard [mailto:mrwayne@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 6:02 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
> >
> >
> > From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
> >
> > Yeah, it might be only a 10 point damage shield, but that sounds great.
> > Think about how bard songs work, they get "recast" every
> > pulse. This should reset the damage shield back to 10 each time. With
>the
> > Healing and Str bonus as well, this might be a very nice
> > spell.
> >
> > Wayne
> >
> > > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> > > Subject: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
> > >
> > > I thought any hit that exceeded a damage shield's remaining hit
>absorbtion
> > > was suffered in full? If this is a 10pt damage shield will it ever
>help?
> > >
> > > Kit
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
> > > Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 3:51 PM
> > > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [eqbards] Niv's Melody of Preservation
> > >
> > >
> > > From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> > >
> > > Information from the spdat.eff file.
> > >
> > > Song: Niv's Melody of Preservation (47th Level)
> > > Skill: Stringed Instruments
> > > Effects: Strength: 10
> > > Protective Skin: 10
> > > Healing/Damage: 1
> > > Max HP: 25
> > >
> > > Whether it's only on the Test Server or not, I do not know, but I
>think
> > > it's safe to assume it'll appear on the regular servers shortly.
> > >
> > > Talies the Wanderer
